mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT code AS sido_code, value AS sido_name, '' AS sigungu_code, '' AS sigungu_name, '' AS road_keyword, '' AS dong_keyword FROM post_si ORDER BY sido_name
SELECT DISTINCT '' AS sido_code, '' AS sido_name, code AS sigungu_code, value AS sigungu_name, '' AS road_keyword, '' AS dong_keyword FROM post_sigungu WHERE code = #{sido} ORDER BY value

SELECT DISTINCT road_id, zipcode AS zip_code, si || ' ' || sigungu || CASE WHEN borough IS NULL THEN '' ELSE ' ' || borough END || CASE WHEN ri IS NULL THEN ' ' ELSE ' ' || ri || ' ' END || road_name || ' ' || building_code1 || DECODE(building_code2, '0', '', '-' || building_code2) || ' ' || building_sigungu AS base_addr FROM road_post_${sidoCode} WHERE sigungu = #{sigunguName} AND (road_name LIKE '%' || #{roadKeyword} || '%' OR building_sigungu LIKE '%' || #{roadKeyword} || '%') ORDER BY road_id
SELECT zip_no AS zip_code, sido || ' ' || gugun || ' ' || dong || ' ' || ri || ' ' || bunji AS base_addr FROM s_zipcode WHERE dong LIKE '%${dong}%' ORDER BY seq
